casebody.data:
Supreme Court — Appellate Term, July, 1898.

Before Beekman, P. J., Gildersleeve and Giegerich, JJ.

J. Walter Thompson, appellant v. Henry E. Child, respondent. - Appeal from a judgment of the General Term of the City Court, affirming a judgment in favor of defend ant entered on a verdict, and from an order denying a motion for anew trial. Henry C. Bryan, for appellant; Duncan Edwards, for respondent.

Judgment affirmed, with costs. No opinion.
